name: Medicine
display_help: You become an adept field medic, and can assist your team with basic healing needs. These close range powers should be performed away from combat because they can be interrupted.
power_short_helps: Ranged, +Status Protection(Ally, PvE), +Status Resistance(Ally, PvP) OR -DMG(Foe, All), -Rech(Foe), -ToHit(Foe)
